Sql.CDATA:
-- table UsrPMCostReassignmentRunHistory IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'UsrPMCostReassignmentRunHistory') BEGIN PRINT 'Create table UsrPMCostReassignmentRunHistory' CREATE TABLE [dbo].UsrPMCostReassignmentRunHistory( [CompanyID] [int] NOT NULL ,[PMReassignmentID] [nvarchar] (15) NOT NULL ,[RevID] [int] NOT NULL ,[SourceTranID] [bigint] NOT NULL ,[SourceTaskID] [int] NOT NULL ,[DestinationTranID] [bigint] NOT NULL ,[DestinationTaskID] [int] NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [PK_UsrPMCostReassignmentRunHistory] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [CompanyID] ASC, [PMReassignmentID] ASC, [RevID] ASC, [SourceTranID] ASC, [SourceTaskID] ASC, [DestinationTranID] ASC, [DestinationTaskID] ASC ) WITH ( PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON ))
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentRunHistory] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_UsrPMCostReassignment_UsrPMCostReassignmentRunHistory] FOREIGN KEY([CompanyID], [PMReassignmentID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignment] ([CompanyID], [PMReassignmentID]) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentRunHistory] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_UsrPMCostReassignment_UsrPMCostReassignmentRunHistory]
END
